price: 115. Sinaamey cagalah digir kee cantalbakah sin ginnem tekkeleenii? Kaadu diggah isin Nee fan aduure waytaanaah gacsime waytaanam tekkeleenii cisab kee galtoh akeeral.
arabic: أَفَحَسِبۡتُمۡ أَنَّمَا خَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ عَبَثٗا وَأَنَّكُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: afaḥasib'tum annamā khalaqnākum ʿabathan wa-annakum ilaynā lā tur'jaʿūna
